info.name: AutomationExercise-API
info.description:
### Welcome to Postman! This is your first collection. 

Collections are your starting point for building and testing APIs. You can use this one to:

â€¢ Group related requests
â€¢ Test your API in real-world scenarios
â€¢ Document and share your requests

Update the name and overview whenever youâ€™re ready to make it yours.

[Learn more about Postman Collections.](https://learning.postman.com/docs/collections/collections-overview/)
